# tidbcloud Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "tidbcloud" {
  username = "fake_username"
  password = "fake_password"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `password` (String, Sensitive) Private Key
- `username` (String, Sensitive) Public Key
